root.text: (They've seen you but still ignore you. Alex and Ana are talking to each other)

suggestion.text: I think Shiphead and Gremlin are the most original ones.

opinion.text: Although it's true {{name}} Shiphead sounds really good hahaha.

jose.text: Hahaha let's see what's Jose's view.

goOn.text: Don't be shy, keep ignoring and thinking how to name me.

root.text: Looks like someone has taken yesterday's picture.
